home.integrity: With Domuus, you stay informed without compromising your child's privacy.
home.historyDescription: Track and view your child's check-ins securely.

history.title: Check-in History
history.description: Here you'll see a clear log of previous check-ins and check-outs. Everything is stored securely and visibly.

auth.signInError: Failed to sign in. Please check your credentials.

howItWorks.title: How Domuus Works
howItWorks.description: Domuus makes it easy to check kids in and out manually – without monitoring them. Parents get instant notifications and check-ins are safe and transparent.
howItWorks.step1Desc: Start by creating a free Domuus account for secure access.
howItWorks.step2Desc: Register your children in the app for easy check-ins.
howItWorks.step3Desc: Check in and out with one tap – no GPS, just notifications.

checkin.title: Easy Check-in
checkin.description: Manually check your child in or out – fast, secure, and hassle-free.

notifications.title: Real-Time Notifications
notifications.description: Get notified instantly when your child checks in or out – stay informed without tracking.

privacy.title: Built for Privacy
privacy.description: Domuus doesn't monitor – it informs. No GPS tracking, just peace of mind.

about.title: About Domuus
about.paragraph1: Domuus is an innovative solution that helps parents keep track of their children with ease. Featuring simple check-ins, instant notifications, and advanced data security, Domuus is built to create peace of mind for families.
about.paragraph2: The app uses modern technology to ensure your data is safe and that you stay informed about your child's whereabouts — without any tracking.

footer.about: Domuus makes it easy to check kids in and out – securely, manually, and without tracking. A tool for modern parents who value privacy.
